Reviews and opinion pieces on machine learning in healthcare

Sim, I. Mobile devices and health. NEJM 2019.

Snyder M, Zhou W. Big data and health. Lancet 2019.

Shah P, Kendall F, Khozin S, et al. Artificial intelligence and machine learning in clinical development: a translational perspective. npj Digit Med 2019

Wiens J, Saria S, Sendak M, et al. Do no harm: a roadmap for responsible machine learning for health care. Nat Med 2019

Rajkomar A, Dean J, Kohane I. Machine Learning in Medicine. N Engl J Med 2019

Maddox TM, Rumsfeld JS, Payne PRO. Questions for Artificial Intelligence in Health Care. JAMA 2019

Gottesman O, Johansson F, Komorowski M, et al. Guidelines for reinforcement learning in healthcare. Nat Med 2019

He J, Baxter SL, Xu J, Xu J, Zhou X, Zhang K. The practical implementation of artificial intelligence technologies in medicine. Nat Med 2019

Esteva A, Robicquet A, Ramsundar B, et al. A guide to deep learning in healthcare. Nat Med 2019

Emanuel EJ, Wachter RM. Artificial Intelligence in Health Care: Will the Value Match the Hype? JAMA 2019

Topol EJ. High-performance medicine: the convergence of human and artificial intelligence. Nat Med 2019

Ghassemi M, Naumann T, Schulam P, Beam AL, Chen IY, Ranganath R. Practical guidance on artificial intelligence for health-care data. Lancet Digit Heal 2019

Collins GS, Moons KGM. Reporting of artificial intelligence prediction models. Lancet 2019

Panch T, Mattie H, Celi LA. The “inconvenient truth” about AI in healthcare. npj Digit Med 2019

Cahan EM, Hernandez-Boussard T, Thadaney-Israni S, Rubin DL. Putting the data before the algorithm in big data addressing personalized healthcare. npj Digit Med 2019

Yu KH, Kohane IS. Framing the challenges of artificial intelligence in medicine. BMJ Qual Saf 2019

Watson DS, Krutzinna J, Bruce IN, et al. Clinical applications of machine learning algorithms: Beyond the black box. BMJ 2019

Price NW. Big data and black-box medical algorithms. Science Translational Medicine 2018.

Yu KH, Beam AL, Kohane IS. Artificial intelligence in healthcare. Nat Biomed Eng. 2018

Beam AL, Kohane IS. Big Data and Machine Learning in Health Care. JAMA 2018

Shortliffe EH, Sepúlveda MJ. Clinical Decision Support in the Era of Artificial Intelligence. JAMA 2018

Wang F, Casalino LP, Khullar D. Deep Learning in Medicine — Promise, Progress, and Challenges. JAMA Intern Med 2018

Stead WW. Clinical Implications and Challenges of Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning. JAMA 2018

Naylor CD. On the Prospects for a (Deep) Learning Health Care System. JAMA 2018

Zhu L, Zheng WJ. Informatics, Data Science, and Artificial Intelligence. JAMA 2018

Nsoesie EO. Evaluating Artificial Intelligence Applications in Clinical Settings. JAMA Netw Open 2018

Hinton G. Deep Learning — A Technology With the Potential to Transform Health Care. JAMA 2018

Chen J, Ash SM. Machine Learning and Prediction in Medicine — Beyond the Peak of Inflated Expectations. NEJM 2017

Beam AL, Kohane IS. Translating Artificial Intelligence Into Clinical Care. JAMA 2016

Obermeyer Z, Emanual EJ. Predicting the Future — Big Data, Machine Learning, and Clinical Medicine. NEJM 2016

Deo, R. Machine learning in medicine. Circulation 2015
